Package hep.aida.ref.remote

Class Summary
RemoteAdapter Class that performs data updates for hep.aida.ref Histograms for another IHistogram.
RemoteAnnotation  
RemoteClient This is Basic implementation of AidaTreeClient that support both "Duplex" and "non-Duplex" modes of communication with the AIDA Tree server.
RemoteCloud1D  
RemoteCloud2D  
RemoteConverter Basic converter for creating and updating RemoteManagedObjects in the client tree.
RemoteDataPointSet This is implementation of IDataPointSet that can not be modified by user.
RemoteFolder  
RemoteHistogram1D This is implementation of IHistogram1D that can not be modified by the user.
RemoteHistogram2D This is implementation of IHistogram2D that can not be modified by the user.
RemoteManagedObject Base class for all IManagedObjects in local AIDA Tree that are copies of remote AIDA Tree objects.
RemoteMutableStore This is Basic implementation of Read-Only IDevMutableStore.
RemoteProfile1D  
RemoteServant This is implementation of the AidaTreeServant.
RemoteServer This is implementation of the AidaTreeServer.
RemoteServerQueue This is thread-safe queue for UpdateEvents.
RemoteTable This is implementation of ITable that can not be modified by the user.
RemoteTableEvent An event send from a ITable to AIDAListeners
RemoteTree  
RemoteTreeUpdater This class can be used to force updates to RemoteManagedObjects in a Tree.
RemoteUnavailableObject  
RemoteUpdatableQueue  
RemoteUpdateEvent  
 

Exception Summary
RemoteConnectionException
